name: Just Dodge!
description:
Just Dodge! is a simple game whose only objective is to dodge enemies and collect as many points as you can. In addition to enemies, you can find collectable items that give you advantages, such as: Extra Health Potion, Shield, Pistol (allows you to eliminate enemies and gain extra points), Score Accelerator and Shrink Pill (More items can be added in the next few updates).

  • Controls: "W, A, S, D" or arrow keys to move. "M" to mute. "Space" to pause game
  • Note: This is my first ever game, so don't expect a great thing (but it's playable and fun!)
